li.p:
(a)
A telegraphic modification or withdrawal of a bid by telephone under the circumstances in FAR 14.303(a) shall not be considered.

(b)
The receipt required by FAR 14.303(b) for withdrawal of a bid in person should read:

conbody.p: I am a bona fide agent for or representative of ___________________________ (Bidderâ€™s name and address). I am authorized to withdraw the bid on IFB No. ___________________scheduled for opening on_______________________, and acknowledge receipt of the unopened bid.
